structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Survival Of Actions And Death And Disabilities Of Parties

law.catch_line: Death Of One Of Several Plaintiffs
law.text: If any of several plaintiffs in a real or mixed action dies before final judgment, his heir or devisee shall be admitted, upon motion, to prosecute the action with the survivors, in the same manner as if he had been originally a party thereto.
